item.description:
Review 2011/ Welcome in 2012!

This evening has been presented for over 25 years. There's plenty of time to reflect and share about what happened to you and what you learned in 2011 and to focus on directions, goals and qualities to develop for 2012. There is a ceremony to let go of 2011, candlelight and a sacred energy on the beauty and mystery of life. Optional vegetarian potluck meal at 6:30pm.

Herb Pearce has been leading workshops for over 32 years. He is the author of several books and is a therapist for individuals, couples and families.

7:30-10pm

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager, Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Review 2011/Welcome 2012
